source.81915fbf: Overall, the model was able to accurately predict a malignant cancer 100% of the time when the cancer was actually malignant (by looking at recall score using malignant cancer as a positive label). Since a malignant cancer is more dangerous than a benign cancer, this metric is more important. Being able to reduce the number of false negatives is more important in this setting in order to better identify which patients actually have a malignant cancer.
